and Justin Vivian Bond , music and lyrics by Sandra Bernhard , Justin Vivian Bond , Lance Horne and Jake Shears . Rob Moose will be the musical director. The new musical, according to press notes, features Bernard and Justin Vivian Bond , who play country cousins whose lives have led them in very different directions. One went from being a rock chick to born again motherhood in the Midwest and the other from small town gay to urban art world sophisticate. When the two meet up again at a family wedding they set of on a journey rediscovering their authentic selves and learning that ideology doesn't mean much when stacked up against art love and really good acid. Jefferies feels that the move by Google to switch Eric Schmidt to Executive Chairman for CEO could not have come at a better time with such a strong last quarter. They are a little skeptic and state that, it does introduce a level of uncertainty around execution under the new leadership, particularly considering the growing competitive landscape.

to good relations with regulators has been communicating and countering misunderstandings about what Google does and does not do.`` We're trying to be as transparent and as collaborative as possible,'' Eric Schmidt said. We try to stay well within the safety zone of the way we're operating with respect to the legal issues and the competitive issues. We also argue very strongly that the things that we're doing are very pro-competitive, and I genuinely believe that, he said. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will oversee strategic projects.
